title: House for sale in Imbulgoda (Amunugoda)
details:
Less then 2 kms from Colombo Kandy Main road
Direct buses to Colombo - Fort, Ganemulla (Railway Station) and Gampaha
1 store room
2 Water lines
Fully residential area
Very quiet & peaceful environment
Clear deeds (can be use for loans)
Plan approved by Pradeshiya Sabha
Price can be negotiate after seen the property
